chunk_id: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0__chunk_1170
source: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0
text:
• The minutes should be concise. They are not a detailed record of everything that is said at the meeting. 
• The attendance register should be attached as an addendum. 
• The key components of the minutes should be: 
• the main issues/gaps in perinatal care identified through the statistics and the case presentations 
• the action plan to address these issues 
• feedback on progress with implementing the previous month’s action plan 
• In the minutes, a brief summary is all that is required reg
